message.content:
cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.SD

Reasoning: The paper discusses a method for learning recurrent computational graphs, which is a common topic in machine learning. Specifically, it focuses on improving the truncated backpropagation through time (BPTT) algorithm, which is widely used in recurrent neural networks. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also evaluates the proposed method on language modeling, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP), hence cs.CL (Computation and Language) is also a possible category. Finally, the paper discusses the bias in the gradient estimate, which is a statistical issue, so cs.SD (Statistics and Machine Learning) is also a possible category.
